headline.main: ST. JOHN'S TO PRAY FOR FOES OF AXIS; Special Meditation Service for U.S., Britain, Russia and China Set for Dec. 3 ENLARGE WEEK'S PROGRAM Bishop Announces Additional Events for Opening of Full Length of Cathedral

lead_paragraph: Special mediation services for this nation, Great Britain, Russia and China, as well as for those killed or otherwise victimized "in the struggle against aggression," have been added to the program for the opening of the full length of the Cathedral of St. John the Divine during the week of Nov. 30, Bishop William T. Manning announced yesterday.
abstract: Special meditation services for war victims planned, Cath of St John the Divine

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: ST JOHN THE DIVINE, CATH OF (MANHATTAN)
